Environmental.name: Maximum impermeable surface in front yard

Constants.Procedures: Street-work permit required for work done within the public right-of-way

Mandatory: Driveway surface within 10' of the public right-of-way may not be of a loose material e.g., gravel
2nd dwelling units must share common driveway with main dwelling

Dimensional.name: Minimum distance between curb cut and intersection curb face

Optional: No more than one curb cut per single frontage

Material.name: Driveway surface material
Material.notes: Grass between pavers or strips is acceptable

Usage.name: Maneuverability
Usage.condition: Turns enroute to required parking spaces must be deemed maneuverable by the Transportation Division

Constants.Standards: City standards for work within public ROW
Constants.Procedures: Streetwork permit required for work done within the public ROW

Mandatory: No gravel or similar loose materials within 10' of the public right-of-way (lot line)
